title: Profile champion
body: Dear Rioter, how can I change the champion/the skin that's on my profile? (If it's a champion that I play a lot or that I played recently, it must be a bug because I'm seeing Sion and I've never played him)

replies.body:
It looks like this was asked during a recent AMA for the client devs:

> We think this is a little bugged right now and we're aiming to fix it hopefully for 6.24, but here's how it SHOULD work.
> Your equipped icon (for ultimate skins and stuff)
> Your recent most-played champion (over the last 20 games)
> Your highest mastery champion

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5di4ej/ama_were_the_league_client_update_team_ask_us/da4rv5y/?st=ivu3a152&sh=947d775c

If you have any feedback, be sure to share it on the client discussion boards.   Today I learned.  :D

Do you mean the champion that shows up when you select your profile?  I think background image is selected by your most recently played champions.  Technically, it looks like yours is Thresh but is showing as Lee Sin.  I recommend reporting this over at the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards in case this is a bug.  I'll also provide any updates here if I find out anymore about how the background feature works.  Thanks for the headsu p!
